org.ensembl.registry
Class DriverGroup

java.lang.Object
  org.ensembl.registry.DriverGroup
public class DriverGroup
extends java.lang.Object

All the EnsemblDrivers for a species-release or a compara driver for a release. Configurations for EnsemblDrivers are set via the setXXXConfig() methods. The drivers they define are lazy loaded on demand and then cached. DriverGroups can be retrieved from Registry instances.

Author:
Craig Melsopp
See Also:
Registry

public DriverGroup()

Method Detail

getCoreDriver

public CoreDriver getCoreDriver()
                         throws AdaptorException
Returns the core driver if a core configuration is set. Delegates to CoreDriverFactory.createCoreDriver(coreConfig) and caches the result.

Returns:
core driver if available, otherwise null.
Throws:
AdaptorException - if a CoreDriver cannot be created from _coreConfig_.
See Also:
CoreDriverFactory

getVariationDriver

public VariationDriver getVariationDriver()
                                   throws AdaptorException
Returns the variation driver if available. Lazy creates via VariationDriverFactory.createVariationDriver(variationConfig) and caches the result. Also sets variationDriver.coreDriver = getCoreDriver().

Returns:
variation driver if available, otherwise null.
Throws:
AdaptorException - if a VariationDriver cannot be created from _variationConfig_.

getComparaDriver

public ComparaDriver getComparaDriver()
                               throws AdaptorException
Returns the compara driver if a compara configuration is set. Delegates to ComparaDriverFactory.createComparaDriver(comparaConfig) and caches the result.

Returns:
compara driver if available, otherwise null.
Throws:
AdaptorException - if a ComparaDriver cannot be created from _comparaConfig_.
